name: Core_InlineArrayList_prependMany
signature: Core_Result Core_InlineArray<Suffix>_prependMany(Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>* SELF, <Type> const* elements, Core_Size numberOfElements);
signatureRemarks: where <Suffix> and <Type> can assume the values of

parameters.name: elements
parameters.description: A pointer to an array of @{code('numberOfElements')} elements.

parameters.name: numberOfElements
parameters.description: The number of elements to append.

success: The @{code('numberOfElements')} elements in the array @{code('elements')} were prepended to this @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix;>')} object.
The elements were prepended in the order of their appearance in the array @{code('elements')}.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
